title: Crime Alert 10.08.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.08.19
description:
A would-be groom decides to rob a bank to finance the wedding ring and the wedding. 16 year-old threatens a mass shooting but uses his own name on his own Instagram account.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
